Class Cherrybomb

java.lang.Object
Plant
Cherrybomb
public class Cherrybomb extends Plant
Represents a Cherrybomb plant, an explosive plant that deals area-of-effect damage. Cherrybombs have a high cost and a long cooldown, and explode shortly after being planted.
Since:
2025-07-30

  • Constructor Details

    • Cherrybomb

      public Cherrybomb(int l, int t)
      Constructs a new Cherrybomb instance at the specified lane and tile. Initializes its damage, sets its initial state to "exploding", and defines its base properties inherited from Plant.
      Parameters:
      l - The lane number where the Cherrybomb is planted.
      t - The tile number within the lane where the Cherrybomb is planted.

  • Method Details

    • action

      public void action(Board board)
      Triggers the Cherrybomb's explosion, dealing damage to all zombies within a 3x3 radius centered on the Cherrybomb's tile.
      Specified by:
      action in class Plant
      Parameters:
      board - The game board, used to access surrounding tiles.

    • explode

      public void explode(Tile t)
      Applies explosion damage to all zombies on a given tile.
      Parameters:
      t - The tile whose zombies will take damage.

    • tryToAction

      public void tryToAction(Board b, double elapsedTime)
      Updates the Cherrybomb's state and triggers its explosion logic. The Cherrybomb explodes once its internal timer (timeSinceLastAttack) reaches its speed threshold. After exploding, its state changes to "exploded" and it begins to "die" by taking damage each update.
      Specified by:
      tryToAction in class Plant
      Parameters:
      b - The game board.
      elapsedTime - The time elapsed since the last update.

    • getCooldown

      public static double getCooldown()
      Retrieves the static cooldown period for planting a Cherrybomb.
      Returns:
      The cooldown in seconds.

    • getCost

      public static int getCost()
      Retrieves the static sun cost for planting a Cherrybomb.
      Returns:
      The sun cost.

    • getTimeSinceLastPlant

      public static double getTimeSinceLastPlant()
      Retrieves the static timestamp of when the last Cherrybomb was planted. Used for cooldown tracking across all Cherrybomb instances.
      Returns:
      The time since the last Cherrybomb was planted.

    • setTimeSinceLastPlant

      public static void setTimeSinceLastPlant(double time)
      Sets the static timestamp for when the last Cherrybomb was planted. Used to reset the cooldown timer.
      Parameters:
      time - The new timestamp.
